page.description: One or more UX controls to read data from to populate the FormView.

discussion.p: The *[ui:UX Controls]* property defines what controls to read from the UX component to populate the FormView control. The [...] smart filed button will display a list of available controls. Select the controls from the list that you'd like to use to populate the FormView.
When using this method to populate the FormView, the UX Controls are often hidden in the UX layout so they're not displayed when the application is rendered.
